display_name: Generalized Anxiety Disorder-7 Questionnaire: Becoming easily annoyed or irritable
description:
Item from the GAD-7 Questionnaire. [Spitzer et al, 2006 (PubMed ID: 16717171)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16717171/)

[Search for all GAD-7 Questionnaire variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/stages/variables?search=gad7)
domain: 0=not at all, 1=several days, 2=more than half the days, 3=nearly every day
